title: Anthropic debuts Claude conversational voice mode on mobile that searches your Google Docs, Drive, Calendar
content: With the rollout of voice mode, Anthropic continues to broaden Claude's functionality and accessibility to all users.Read More
summary: Anthropic has introduced a new conversational voice mode for its Claude AI assistant on mobile devices, allowing users to search their Google Docs, Drive, and Calendar using voice commands. This update enhances Claude's functionality and makes it more accessible to a wider range of users.

title: Security leaders lose visibility as consultants deploy shadow AI copilots to stay employed
content: Fearing sweeping layoffs driven by AI and automation, elite consultants and high performers are turning to shadow AI for a competitive edge.Read More
summary: Elite consultants and high performers are using shadow AI copilots to stay competitive and avoid potential job loss due to AI and automation. This trend is leading to security leaders losing visibility and control over the use of AI within their organizations.

title: Mistral launches API for building AI agents that run Python, generate images, perform RAG and more
content: For professionals like the Lead AI Engineer or Senior AI Engineer, the Mistral Agents API represents a powerful addition to their AI toolkit.Read More
summary: Mistral has launched an API that allows professionals to build AI agents that can run Python, generate images, perform RAG, and more. This API is a valuable tool for Lead AI Engineers and Senior AI Engineers looking to enhance their AI capabilities.

title: Build a Rocket Boy drops trailer detailing MindsEye’s blend of Grand Theft Auto and AI robot combat
content: IOI Partners and Build a Rocket Boy dropped a new trailer on MindsEye, a new title coming on June 10 from the co-creator of Grand Theft Auto V.Read More
summary: The article discusses the new trailer for MindsEye, a game that blends elements of Grand Theft Auto with AI robot combat. The game is set to be released on June 10 and is created by the co-creator of Grand Theft Auto V.

title: What Salesforce’s $8B acquisition of Informatica means for enterprise data and AI
content: Industry analysts explain how Salesforce's $8 billion Informatica acquisition will transform enterprise data management and accelerate agentic AI adoption .Read More
summary: Salesforce's acquisition of Informatica for $8 billion is expected to revolutionize enterprise data management and drive faster adoption of AI technologies in businesses. This move signifies a significant shift towards more advanced AI capabilities and data-driven decision-making in the corporate world.

title: Gridcare thinks more than 100 GW of data center capacity is hiding in the grid
content: Gridcare raised $13.3 million for its data platform that finds underutilized capacity on the electrical grid.
summary: Gridcare has developed a data platform that identifies over 100 GW of underutilized capacity on the electrical grid, leading to increased efficiency and potential cost savings. The company recently raised $13.3 million in funding to further develop and expand its platform.

title: From disruption to reinvention: How knowledge workers can thrive after AI
content: We are beginning a cognitive migration: Away from what AI now does well, and toward a redefinition of what humans are now made for.Read More
summary: The article discusses the shift in the role of knowledge workers in the age of AI, emphasizing the need for humans to redefine their skills and capabilities as AI technology advances. It suggests that instead of being disrupted by AI, knowledge workers can thrive by focusing on tasks that require human creativity, emotional intelligence, and critical thinking.
